text:
MoneyLion is really great. Every time I‚Äôve needed to use their services, they are always reliable, and I can always depend on them for a payday advance. 

When I first started using them, I had trouble with their systems not verifying my license, but after quite some time of waiting, they finally verified my information and identity and allowed me to start using their Instacash service.

I really appreciate MoneyLion and all of the assistance they provide to the people who use their services. There are a few trustworthy and dependable companies out there that you can get a quick cash advance or even a loan to build your credit from, and MoneyLion is definitely one of them. 

Thanks, MoneyLion!
title: MoneyLion is one of the best!

reply.message: Thank you for taking time to leave a detailed review about your experience, Samantha. We are very happy to see that we were able to work through the struggle that you encountered when first trying to use the app, and we are glad to have you as part of the MoneyLion community.

text:
DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I signed up for a Credit Builder account with MoneyLion. MoneyLion, not once through the entire 12 months that I paid my loan, never notified the credit bureaus of an on time payment. They never did anything to help my credit. Now that I paid off the loan, in full and early, ML is reporting that my account is delinquent. As of today, 10/20/2023, over a month after my loan was paid off early and in full, MoneyLion has reported my account as delinquent in the amount of $196.DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!
title: DO NOT USE - MONEYLION

text: It hurts my heart to give this company 1 star but I have to bring awareness so other people don‚Äôt go through what I‚Äôm going through. I been a customer of MoneyLion for years and enjoyed their various products which include instacash (a cool feature to increase your cash flow) and 2 day early direct deposit. The reason for the one star is the dispute process which is very old fashioned and inconvenient to the customer. Imagine a scenario where you didn‚Äôt receive your Amazon goods where you spent hundreds or even thousands of hard earned dollars on. You go to the merchant and they can‚Äôt help you so you go to the only one you can trust , your card provider aka bank aka MoneyLion. Now you goto dispute and they tell you instead of receiving your provisional credit within hours like most banks do, that you have to wait 10 business days and if ‚Äúqualified will receive your provisional credit back.‚Äù It was a let down hearing that but I waited patiently and the 10th business day comes I contact customer support for them to tell me they working on it and to mail them the dispute. Like what? Why you guys didn‚Äôt tell me prior to do that? And now they telling me it can take 90 days to receive it and provisional credits are not guaranteed. All around it sounds like a big red flag and I don‚Äôt like that. When people spend their hard earned dollars on something why you guys making the customer feel at fault and holding their money hostage? This is one of the worst experiences ever and I‚Äôm moving my direct deposit and will never invest in this business.
title: It hurts my heart

reply.message: We completely understand your frustration, Shanice. We were able to confirm that your concern is being reviewed and that one of our dedicated customer advocates will be contacting you directly.

reply.message: We know that it can be frustrating when expectations are not met, Sandy. In most cases, employers send direct deposit information prior to the actual pay date, and we do our best to ensure that the direct deposit is credited to the account at the time it's received. However, the exact timing of when you will receive your funds depends on your payroll provider. Should you have additional questions, please fill out and submit our contact form by copy and pasting this link; https://mlion.info/customerhelp into an open browser window and one of our customer advocates will reach out to you.
